abstract: It may not be mentioned in the same breath as Milan or Paris, but Prague has a strong and creative fashion scene. Here is a guide to some of the top shops in town.
snippet: It may not be mentioned in the same breath as Milan or Paris, but Prague has a strong and creative fashion scene. Here is a guide to some of the top shops in town.
lead_paragraph: It may not be mentioned in the same breath as Milan or Paris, but Prague has a strong and creative fashion scene.

headline.main: A Guide to Prague Designers and Their Boutiques
